channel.title: Help [RS Private server]
channel.description:
Hi, I used one of the guides on Sythe and I managed to make a server, but I'm having trouble making it online. I did all the steps in the guide except the port-fowarding. My server works when I connect to the default IP (127.0.0.1) but not my no-ip (legit-scape.no-ip.biz).
My router is a Siemens Speedstream-6520, and when I enter my IP into the address bar, I get the login. My user is Admin, and pass is Password. I get a different look then from the guide, and I get lost when I'm trying to port-forward port 43594.
Pic of my router log in.
So, how do I port-forward on my router:S?
I think I set the port.. but it still doesnt work:S
[IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l359/k0ala21/ip.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l359/k0ala21/Untitled-1.jpg[/img] THANK YOU!

item.title: Help [RS Private server]
item.dc:creator: @german_tower german_tower
item.description:
@german_tower wrote:

First of all you will probably need to use No-Ip and port forward it so it’s usable. All of this information on how to set up and run a server can be found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285415.0.html

Read full topic

good luck man

item.title: Help [RS Private server]
item.dc:creator: @legitscape legitscape
item.description:
@legitscape wrote:

Hi, I used one of the guides on Sythe and I managed to make a server, but I’m having trouble making it online. I did all the steps in the guide except the port-fowarding. My server works when I connect to the default IP (127.0.0.1) but not my no-ip (legit-scape.no-ip.biz).

My router is a Siemens Speedstream-6520, and when I enter my IP into the address bar, I get the login. My user is Admin, and pass is Password.
I get a different look then from the guide, and I get lost when I’m trying to port-forward port 43594.

Pic of my router log in.

So, how do I port-forward on my router:S?

I think I set the port… but it still doesnt work:S


THANK YOU!
